column5: Hey fisherfolk, Quick question about kushog. I’m headed up next weekend for a short/quick tourney with some pals. Bass/pike, 4 fish limit, 100% cnr, heaviest bag overall - just our annual thing for fun. I don’t really know the lake, fished it once years ago. Any recommendations on the quickest way to get on some fish? Really, any intel to save me some time and catch some fish is much appreciated. cheers, mob
